description:
《英乐天天唱》是一档模仿唱歌类节目，目的在于提升大家的英语口语能力。主持人会在每期节目中选取好听的歌曲片段，并给出发音提示和模仿示例。喜欢听音乐的童鞋可要积极参与哦！去沪江部落订阅本节目！

【歌手介绍】
舞动精灵乐团（Groove Coverage ） 是德国2001年新晋的乐队，以其混合多种元素的舞曲风格迅速走红，驰名全欧。God Is A Girl（上帝是女孩）就是Groove Coverage的经典作品之一。
另外，在中国颇为受欢迎的歌曲还有：Far Away From Home，7 Years And 50 Days ，She，Runaway、On The Radio等。
近年来的代表作品有：Innocent、Angeline、Riot On the Dancefloor等。
Groove Coverage是德国最成功的舞曲艺术家之一。乐队曾有12首单曲进入德国前50强，其中3首单曲更进入前10。4张独立专辑发行量超过500万张（仅在中国发行量就超过200万张）。G.C立志成为德国最成功的舞曲音乐家。
Far Away From Home 是Groove Coverage在2002发行的专辑<Covergirl>中的歌曲

模唱部分：

【歌词】
I'm loving living every single day
But sometimes I feel so...
I hope to find a little peace of mind
And I just want to know.
【模唱部分】
And who can heal those tiny broken hearts,and what are we to be.
Where is home on the milky way of stars,I dry my eyes again.
In my dreams I am not so far away from home,
What am I in a world so far away from home,
All my life all the time so far away from home,
Without you I will be so far away from home.
If we could make it through the darkest night
we'd have a brighter day
The world I see beyond your pretty eyes,
makes me want to stay.
And who can heal those tiny broken hearts,
And what are we to be.
Where is home on the milky way of stars?
I dry my eyes again.
In my dreams I'm not so far away from home,
What am I in a world so far away from home?
All my life all the time so far away from home
Without you I'll be so far away from home.
I count on you, no matter what they say,
Cause love can find it's time.
I hope to be a part of you again,
baby let us shine.
And who can heal those tiny broken hearts,
And what are we to be.
Where is home on the milky way of stars?
I dry my eyes again.
In my dreams I'm not so far away from home,
What am I in a world so far away from home?
All my life all the time so far away from home
Without you I'll be so far away from home.

讲解：

title: 英文歌曲天天唱：Far away from home

description:
Now tomorrow, American astronaut Scott Kelly is embarking on a very special year-long mission to the International Space Station because Scott's twin brother Mark, who is also an astronaut, will be monitored back on Earth so that the differences between their physiology can be recorded. Mark and Scott are the only twins who have both been in space. They were born and brought up in the state of New Jersey and both had distinguished careers in the US Navy before applying for astronaut training at the American space agency NASA. I spoke to the twins last year.

I think it's very easy to tell us apart but, you know, I never have a problem with it.

What are the signs?

Well, you know, most people use the fact that Mark has a moustache and I do not.

That's a giveaway, isn't it? But when you were younger, Mark, did people use to mistake you for each other?

Yeah, all the time, even at NASA. I had somebody, another astronaut, mistake me for him while he was in space. They would know better.

And Scott, who developed the idea of going into space first?

Now I think he did, 'cause he had applied the time before the time that we both got selected.

Now you both signed up for the Navy and it was from there that you both applied to join NASA. Mark, you led the way. What prompted you to take that decision to apply to NASA?

Yeah, I wanted to serve my country.

It's an exciting career. You know, it's the ultimate. One of the ultimate things to do in aviation is to land and take off after being on an aircraft carrier. But then as a, later as a Navy test pilot, the next logical step for a lot of test pilots is to fly the space shuttle.

title: 太空弟兄（有声）

description:
《英文天天写》是沪江社团一档写作类社刊，其目的在于提升大家的英语写作能力。每期节目主持人都会给出一个话题，积极参加的童鞋还会得到主持人的专业点评哦！想提高英语写作的童鞋千万不要错过哦！去沪江社团订阅本社刊！

       

话题：

Writing: imagine a scenario or express your opinion
Batch
A batch means a number of items are grouped together. What does the batch contain? Where is this batch found? How is the batch useful?
This week's topic: They inspected the batch... (90-110 words)

Suggestions:
1) a batch of cookies
2) unzipping a batch of files
3) processing a larger batch allows for a lower cost per unit
4) ordering several batches
5) Instead of writing a scenario, feel free to comment on the story below.

范例1：

From all the files he sifted through in the entire database of the private drive, it now came down to a few files which were most likely to contain what he was searching for. It seemed though what he was looking for was not in a single file, but scattered through a few of these files in this selected batch of files. Doug had already tried it, the system would not allow him to extract and save. He could only view the file on screen. But as indicated by the brightening sky, Doug had no time.
